Major AI Developments.title: Delhi: Tears, silence mark final journey of pilot, co-pilot of Ajit Pawarâ€™s aircraft
Major AI Developments.summary: Captain Sumit Kapoor and co-pilot Shambhavi Pathak, who died in a Maharashtra plane crash, were laid to rest in Delhi. Kapoor was remembered as a warm and experienced pilot, while Pathak was mourned for her vibrant spirit and upcoming wedding. The two pilots were part of the crew of an aircraft linked to Ajit Pawar.

AI Start-Up News.title: 1Buy.AI raises Rs 32.5 Cr in seed round led by 100Unicorns
AI Start-Up News.summary: 1Buy.AI, a procurement and cost-reduction platform, has raised Rs 32.5 crore in a seed funding round led by 100Unicorns. The funding round also saw participation from investors such as Ashish Kacholia, Gruhas, and FJ Labs. The fresh funds will be used to develop compliant SaaS platforms and expand global data pipes.
